alert.note: Alert for Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills; Lower Yukon River; Yukon Delta Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued January 06 at 7:05PM AKST until January 08 at 3:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM AKST MONDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Additional snow accumulations of up to 5 inches, especially at higher elevations. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills. * WHEN...Until 3 AM AKST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds and poor visibilities are likely. This will lead to whiteout conditions, making travel extremely difficult.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills; Lower Yukon River; Yukon Delta Coast
